title: Double chocolate fudge cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '225g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '170g milk chocolate chips', '85g dark chocolate chips', '170g fudge, chopped into small pieces', '100g pecans, chopped']
